overview: Three escaped convicts take refuge in a secluded home and hold it's owners hostage. What follows is a hard-hitting, one-of-a-kind movie. The convicts force these people into ultra-kinky sex games. No holds are barred as director David "Men In Steel" McCabe takes you on an excursion into psycho-sexual perversion. "Men on the Loose"... there's nothing like it.
tagline: They're loose but they like it tight!
title: Men on the Loose
